LanguageData.BM_SpacerPowerFangCombatModule.label: power fang module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerPowerFangCombatModule.descripti: A high-tech combat-oriented device that can be installed into a jaw or any compatible artificial jaw replacement. This particular model comes with a set of razor-sharp plasteel teeth and compact hydraulics that allow the user to bite with incredible force.
